Episodes.Title: Good Times with Weapons
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Adrien Beard
Episodes.Plot: The boys lie to get ninja weapons from the fair, but must decide whether or not to tell their parents when Butters is injured with a throwing star.

Episodes.Title: Up the Down Steroid
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Jimmy begins using steroids to improve his chances in the special Olympics. Meanwhile, Cartman disguises himself as a handicapped boy so he can enter as well and win the cash prize.

Episodes.Title: The Passion of the Jew
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Cartman leads a campaign against the Jews after seeing "The Passion Of The Christ." Meanwhile, Stan and Kenny try to get their money back from Mel Gibson and discover that he is completely insane.

Episodes.Title: You Got F'd in the A
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Nico Agnone
Episodes.Plot: A gang of kids from the O.C. challenge Stan to a dance-off. But before the big event, Butters must confront a painful event from his past.

Episodes.Title: AWESOM-O
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: Cartman dresses up as a robot from Japan, sent to Butters. He tricks him into believing it and can't give away his identity because he finds out Butters has a video of him dancing to Britney Spears and kissing a Justin Timberlake ...

Episodes.Title: The Jeffersons
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Dante Alexander
Episodes.Plot: Michael Jackson moves to South Park but tries to conceal his identity. and local cops try to frame him because he is a rich black man.

Episodes.Title: Goobacks
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: When people from a poverty-stricken future travel back in time to find work, South Park residents accuse them of taking their jobs.

Episodes.Title: Douche and Turd
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Jennifer Howell
Episodes.Plot: Stan refuses to vote in the school mascot election because his choices are a giant douche and a turd sandwich. Unfortunately, his views on voting are seen as un-American, and he is ultimately banished from the town.

Episodes.Title: Something Wall-Mart This Way Comes
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: When a Wall-Mart built in South Park takes business away from local businesses, the boys go to the company's headquarters to get it destroyed.

Episodes.Title: Pre-School
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, April Stewart
Episodes.Plot: A bully who was sent to juvenile hall in a misunderstanding is released, and comes looking for revenge.

Episodes.Title: Quest for Ratings
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Adrien Beard
Episodes.Plot: The boys begin to exaggerate stories when their student news show falls behind in the ratings.

Episodes.Title: Stupid Spoiled Whore Video Playset
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, John 'Nancy' Hansen
Episodes.Plot: Mr. Slave fights against Paris Hilton when she becomes a bad influence on the girls in South Park. Meanwhile, Paris offers Butters' parents a huge amount of money if she can keep Butters as a pet.

Episodes.Title: Cartman's Incredible Gift
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Adrien Beard
Episodes.Plot: Cartman mistakenly believes he is a psychic, and is recruited by the police to help them with investigations.

Episodes.Title: Woodland Critter Christmas
Episodes.Writer: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Brian Graden
Episodes.Actors: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Dante Alexander
Episodes.Plot: Stan helps a group of woodland critters by killing a mountain lion, only to discover that he's helping them give birth to the Antichrist.
